Text: Re Southern Cc I zeroed the path on deal and left pathed on at meter and pathed for both deals at meter for only I also notified Betsy BoringSouthern about the situation and explained to her that any deal they make on EOL cannot be changed in any way however we would move the gas for the th only because we okd the change before we realized it was an EOL deal

Out of the Officenote that I will be out of the on Tuesday July th through Friday July th I will return on Monday the th In my absense my desk will be covered as follows Tom Acton Lonestar Katydaily confirmations Aquila Headerdaily confirmations Trunklinedaily confirmations Oasis Katydaily confirmations Oneok transportdaily scheduling Western transportdaily scheduling Midcon transportdaily scheduling Carlos Rodriguez Lonestar Pipe Lineoffsystem schedulingpathing Midcon Pipe Lineoffsystem schedulingpathing Dow Pipe Lineoffsystem schedulingpathing Eddie JanzenMary Poorman Oasis Pipe Lineoffsystem nominationsschedulingpathing Thanks Mark x

Cornhusker Up on thwith Ken Reisz Operations Mgr and he said the plant is due to be up on Friday Nov th so we will need to start nominating the gas for that day on He expects a full load to be pulled Of course that what we thought before the last catastrophy

Conoco supply cuts on Oasis Cc from El Paso DWE was cut into Oasis nom cut to cut of nom cut to cut of Delivery into HPL from Oasis Katy kept whole I entered these cuts in the estimate column in MOPS for both OasisHPL OasisENAplease verify that is correct Thanks Mark
Tenaska IVCleburne March is the spreadsheet for March Thanks Mark
FYI Kinder Morgan StgKinder Morgan will be injecting day into Bammel storage during April Thanks Mark x

April Flexible Katy GasHere is what I show so far for April baseloadterm Katy flexible purchase gas Oasis meter Aquila Duke Richardson Conoco Total Flexible Lonestar meter Duke inflexible Mitchell Crosstex Baseload sale Total Flexible Thanks Mark x

Oasis OnLine Cc Oasis will be doing away with the temporary passwords for their online nom confirm system effective so it looks like you will need to review the agreement and get set up on it It is not mandatory however they are encourageing everyone to get on board Let me know what you want to do I have attached the agreement and info on the nomconfirm cycles I have been using it this week and it is pretty user friendly The reporting capabilities are still being developed but I am told it should be ready soon Take a look for yourself wwwoasispipelinecomlogon northpassword enroncurrently no intradays are allowed onlineonly by faxemail because they want to approve same days but they are looking at allowing them in the future Mark

Net Out with Kinder MorganBeginning March st Cc Please make a note that we did a deal with Kinder Morgan that nets out and should not be billed or paid The purchase deal ticket is Hardy St and the sale is Mobil Beaumont for a volume of MMBtu Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Mark x
CES changes eff CES changes effectie Lonestar From to total receipt delivered to HPLKaty after fuel Midcon KinderMorgan From to total receipt change to GretaToc

CORNSHUCKER I entered the changes for Tenaska IV Brazos for the th thI made the changes to the Brazos ticket and the Tenaska IV ticket let me know if you have any questions or if a wrong ticket was changed Spreadsheet is updated Brazos called for the following th th Still waiting to hear when the plant will be back up Thanks Mark

Re Midcon Transport Usage Tickets Mardone Daren J CT AM To Mark NRON cc Subject Re Midcon Transport Usage Tickets Mar You can copy the old tickets or create new ones What ever you need D Mark NRON AM To Daren J CT cc Subject Midcon Transport Usage Tickets Mar Daren I noticed that the Midcon transport usage tickets at Oakville Moore are not in for March The previous deal tickets are for that transport Should they Let me know if you want me to set up new tickets if need beor let me know if you create them so I can update MOPS POPS Thanks Mark
CES change on LonestarFYI I changed CES back to the first adjustment of Mark

Midcon Transport Usage Tickets MarI noticed that the Midcon transport usage tickets at Oakville Moore are not in for March The previous deal tickets are for that transport Should they Let me know if you want me to set up new tickets if need beor let me know if you create them so I can update MOPS POPS Thanks Mark

Guadalupe for Intradayhad a plant go down today and therefore had to get some gas off Oasis so they took all from AEC back into the Aquila Header so I moved the deals to reflect this on WGR Aquila Header Guadalupe deals They said there is a chance they will have to do it again tomorrow Let me know if you have any questions Mark

Feb th Sale to AquilaDarenOn the th there is a sale to Aquila on the Header system for I think we were supplying it with AEC For whatever reason I had the AEC into Midconwhich isnt right because there was no market for it and Midcon wasnt looking for it but the Aquila deal was at on WGR Aquila So I went ahead and changed the AEC ticket to match up with the Aquila deal Let me know if you think it is incorrect Thanks Mark
CES Changes on th thwanted to make sure you heard about the CES changes on Midcon on the th and th so let me know if you didnt get Carlos sheet Mark x

Kinder Morgan Net Out for Aquila Header meter HPL meter Cc a note that on at Aquila Header WGR pipe in system meter HPLAquila Hdr meter that there is a net out of purchase deal sale to Kinder Morgan deal for a volume Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Mark x

Entex deal for Jan Cc a note that I added meter MidconBammel to the Entex deal for January st nd for flow that occured I pathed a to come across to POPS but the following will be allocated to the deal st nd Total actual flow volume Patsy with MidconKinderMorgan is aware of this and agrees Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Mark x

Cleburne Plant Maintenance UpdateI checked with Ken Reisz with Tenaska IV this afternoon re maintenance being completed and at this point they are still on track to come back up on the th sometimehowever he did say that they have not gotten a look at everything just yet but expect to have a better idea as to their downtime in the morning He said he would call Mary with the latest news Mary please check with him on Thursday to see where they are at at if we need to nom gas to Lonestar or not Thanks Mark

Out of the Office ththI will be out of the office Wednesday Feb th through Friday the th returning on Monday Mary Poorman and Tom Acton will be backing me up Mary will handle off system nominations Oasis Lonestar Cornshucker Midcon Tom will handle the following meter confirmations Oasis Katy contact Paul McPheeters Lonestar Katy contact Gary Gafford Aquila Hdr Katy contact Sue Zimmerman should receive fax confirm Trunkline katy contact Mark Enns should receive fax confirm Midcon Hardy contact Patsy Shimek Midcon Flagstaff contact Patsy Shimek Thanks Mark x
Point change to Tagg deal I changed the meter point on deal Duke FS from to meter effective st Thanks Mark

change to tenaska iv volumeI changed the volume of the Tenaska IV deal to reflect the correct fuel amount it was less fuel because some of the supply was from the katy areanew sale total of after removed for Brazos

Re HPL Meter South Katy Gas Unit No Cc The trader said this deal needed to be renegotiated and I am waiting to hear what happenedI sent him an email today to remind him that I need an answer asapIll let you know as soon as I hear Thanks Mark x Clem CT PM To Daren J CT cc Mark nron Edward CT Subject HPL Meter South Katy Gas Unit No Daren During the month of September and October gas flowed into HPLs pipeline at the above meter that is owned by Duke Energy Trading and Marketing LLC Prior to September the gas was purchased under contract and Deal that expired on Effective the gas was again purchased from Duke under Contract Deal but this deal expires on Currently Logistic has September and October volumes recorded to HPL Strangers Gas Contract In order to correct this HPL Logistics needs either Deals or extended to cover September and October a new deal to cover September and October or Logistics needs approval to writeoff these volumes to Unaccounted for Gas Loss Print sign and return the original to Clem Cernosek DealDeal TicketCustomer BuyerSeller OR APPROVAL to Writeoff the volumes to Unaccounted for Gas Loss In addition since Deal expires on and gas is still flowing Logistics needs either Deal extended or a new deal to cover December and any other future months that this production is flowing into HPLs pipeline New Deal Thanks Clem

Kinder Morgan Cannon Sale Change Cc Please note that of the Kinder Morgan sale was moved from Hardy meter to Flagstaff meter intraday on the th and carried forward through the end of the month due to pressure problems This change was confirmed with Patsy Shimek Kinder Morgan Thanks Mark x

Re Tuesday December th Cc here on Tuesday Mary Poorman AM To Michael nron Tom NRON Clem CT Robert CT Jackie CT Sabrae CT Carlos J CT Mark nron Aimee CT Mary nron Eddie nron cc Daren J CT Lauri A CT Subject Tuesday December th We will need a small staff to handle potential trades for Wed the th Most of the pipelines are out of the office so I would expect the work load to be minimal I plan on coming in and would like to have a minimum of three on staff so I need two volunteers one offsystem just in case If anyone is going to be in town please forward a number in case we need to call any additional people in or have you work on a laptop from home I will get with you after the new year to make up the holiday you miss or you can schedule your day now I have the calendars Also I will be out on vacation Friday Dec nd and will need someone to send the nominations to the plants I dont expect to have full system coverage just HPLHPL and HPLENA as needed Let me know if you are interested in learning how to do this Thank you Mary

CornhuskerCleburne Plant Outageword on the Cleburne plant outage Most likely will not be back up before November st Ken Reisz Plant Operations Mgr said they have been unable to totally break apart the turbines due to the damage and know all the parts they will need yet Mark x

Feedback error for Meter Cc It looks like deal purchase from Duke at meter South Katy Gas Unit needs to be renegotiated The deal expired and they are allocating the gas to us for September Let me know as soon as you can so we can make sure the gas is allocated correctly for September and so it can set it up for October if need be Thanks Mark x Forwarded by Mark McCoyCorpEnron on AM Mark McCoy AM To Sherlyn CT Fred CT Karen NRON cc Pat NRON Rita CT Subject Feedback error for Meter I spoke with Daren Farmer re deal that expired at meter and he said the deal needs to be renegotiated in order for us to agree to buy that gas that is being allocated to us volume of MMBtu for Sept on gathering contract Unfortunately Danny Conner handles this deal and he is out this week Daren said to wait until he gets back next week before we do anything with it Thanks Mark x Forwarded by Mark McCoyCorpEnron on AM From Sherlyn Schumack ECT AM To Rita CT Fred CT Katherine CT Anita CT Tom NRON Pat NRON Bob M nron Karen NRON Aimee CT Carlos J CT Robert CT Mary nron Susan nron Mark nron Eddie nron Jackie CT cc Subject Feedback errors These are deals that were on the monitor as of

meter South Katy Gas Unit AllocationI need some help with meter for September due to a feedback error Deal purchase from Duke on gathering contract is erroring out due to its expiration date of however it still showed up in POPS wo a nom on Volume management allocated volume to it according to the allocation statement Should this deal be extended I noticed it is not out there for October either I have the feedback error sheet allocation if you want to see them Let me know Mark x ps Fred Boas said you used to handle this and you were very wise in the art of allocationso I am expecting big results Grasshopper

CleburneTenaska IV Outage Cc Forwarded by Mark McCoyCorpEnron on AM Mike Mazowita AM To Mark nron cc Subject CleburneTenaska IV Outage Mark I understand that you need a note for your files regarding the Tenaska plant On Saturday October at am the plant had a catastrophic failure of the gas turbine The entire plant is essentially shutdown until these repairs can be made This outage will last a minimum of days Ken Riesz will keep you informed of our progress I hope this is what you need Let me know Michael Mazowita

Out of Officenote that I will be out of the office on Friday In my absence Tom Acton will be handling the Oasis Lonestar interconnects at Katy and Mary Poorman will handle the nomination to Oasis and Cornhusker if necessary but it is already nominated for the weekend Thanks Mark x

Tenaska IV outage update Cc that the Cleburne plant is expected to come back up on Sat morning the th of October I have already submitted the nominations to Lonestar for the weekend thth taking all gas to the plant If they come up early we have imbalance gas that will serve them I have informed Mary of this and will give her a copy of the noms s and contacts etc Thanks Mark x Forwarded by Mark McCoyCorpEnron on PM Mike Mazowita AM To Mark nron cc Daren J CT Subject Tenaska IV outage update FYI Forwarded by Mike MazowitaCorpEnron on AM Mike Gough on AM Please respond to To Mazowita Mike MIKE NRONCOM cc Scarborough Dan Ward Chuck Subject Tenaska IV outage update We are finally beginning to put closure on our outage It has been frustrating to say the least We are currently projecting a late Friday or early Saturday morning startup barring any unseen problems MG

Cornhuskerthe email below from Kathy Benedict If Im not mistaken I thought we didnt take end up taking over Cornhusker completely until October I thought Tenaska was still doing it at least accounting for it Therefore this gas wasnt pathed during the monthand I believe we didnt have all the tickets in at the time What do you recall Thanks Mark x Forwarded by Mark McCoyCorpEnron on AM Katherine CT PM To Daren J CT Mark nron cc Bob nron Subject HeadsUp Tenaska IV Partner Ltd September Hi Guys Please do me and Bob Fisher in the Transport Settlements group a huge favorPlease let us know when the TXULonestar transport deals for Tenaska IV Texas Partners have been entered into Path Manager for September I am holding the transport invoice from TXULonestar for September waiting to enter the actuals into our system for payment Thanks Kathy
OasisHPL Interconnect cutsOasis made cut to WGR sale to HPL on Sunday Monday for day reference deal due to loss of supply Thanks Mark x

Cornhusker Deal TicketsI know youre busy with bid week so here are a couple questions comments for you September I need to know if a ticket has been set up for September for the market side of the Williams Apache gas We still only the supply is in MOPS If it just needs points added to it just let me know the deal ticket August st This was the day we scheduled the payback to our two transport contracts on Lonestar Currently they do not have the supply points needed for the Williams Apache gas in order for the gas to be pathed to imbalanceso I will get them added so this gas can be pathed July Aug These days were pathed as buysells from Tenaska IV to Tenaska Marketing Ventures I worked with volume management to get these out in time for payment July Aug business and had them do a manual entry for Aug st Please let me know what you think when you get a chance Thanks Mark x

CorhshuckerThe invoices are being paid by us nowJames Armstrong is taking care of them so that is who I am forwarding them to He apparently is paying for them of an account set up for this He is out of the office but he called me back and said to keep forwarding him the invoices Let me know if we have any questions Thanks Mark x

Cynergy ApacheHughes with Cynergy agent for Apache is requesting the force majure letter for Novth due to the Cornhusker plant not coming up Can we get one typed up to send to her for Apache Thanks Mark

Supply for Midlothian FYI Exxon supply at Mobil Cayanosa has fallen off due to problems so starting there nom will go from down to and going at least through the weekend Stacey has already bought gas from Duke to resupply the difference Midlothian at Duke Pegasus in addition to the incremental she bought there So for the weekend we should have a sale to Midlothian of at Pegasus Mark x

Cleburne Imbalancepst Daren Bad newsthe Cleburne imbalance is out of control You might want to start some payback to Lonestar Lonestars estimates for the accumulative imbalance at the beginning of May was due them now I guess their actuals came in and now at the beginning of May shows due them I am waiting to hear back from Lisa with Lonestar to see why there is such a big discrepancy Through the th her updated estimates reflect an imbalance of due themthe plant continues to overpull our nom to the plant which is not all due to Brazos take Let me know what you want to do Mark

Re Tuesday December th Cc here on Tuesday Mary Poorman AM To Michael nron Tom NRON Clem CT Robert CT Jackie CT Sabrae CT Carlos J CT Mark nron Aimee CT Mary nron Eddie nron cc Daren J CT Lauri A CT Subject Tuesday December th We will need a small staff to handle potential trades for Wed the th Most of the pipelines are out of the office so I would expect the work load to be minimal I plan on coming in and would like to have a minimum of three on staff so I need two volunteers one offsystem just in case If anyone is going to be in town please forward a number in case we need to call any additional people in or have you work on a laptop from home I will get with you after the new year to make up the holiday you miss or you can schedule your day now I have the calendars Also I will be out on vacation Friday Dec nd and will need someone to send the nominations to the plants I dont expect to have full system coverage just HPLHPL and HPLENA as needed Let me know if you are interested in learning how to do this Thank you Mary

Oasis OnLine Cc Daren Oasis will be doing away with the temporary passwords for their online nom confirm system effective so it looks like you will need to review the agreement and get set up on it It is not mandatory however they are encourageing everyone to get on board Let me know what you want to do I have attached the agreement and info on the nomconfirm cycles I have been using it this week and it is pretty user friendly The reporting capabilities are still being developed but I am told it should be ready soon Take a look for yourself wwwoasispipelinecomlogon northpassword enroncurrently no intradays are allowed onlineonly by faxemail because they want to approve same days but they are looking at allowing them in the future Mark
